document.full_text: an influential youth leader and staunch supporter of ivory coast's laurent gbagbo on saturday called on his "young patriot" followers to sign up for the army and "liberate" the country.
document.title: ivorian youth leaders tells followers to join army
lines_and_colors: an influential youth leader and staunch supporter of ivory coast's laurent gbagbo on saturday called on his "young patriot" followers to sign up for the army and "liberate" the country.
